What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download.

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download.

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

For at screenshotte hele siden skal den rulle til hver synlig del, så vær tålmodig, da den hurtigt samler alle stykkerne. I det sjældne scenarie, hvor din side er for stor til, at Chrome kan gemme i ét billede, vil den fortælle dig det og dele den op i billeder i separate faner.

Paras tapa ottaa koko sivun kuvakaappaus nykyisestä selainikkunasta. Napsauta Screenshot-kuvaketta (tai paina Alt+Shift+P), katso, kuinka laajennus kaappaa jokaisen sivun osan ja siirrytään kuvakaappauksen uudelle välilehdelle, josta voit ladata sen kuvana tai PDF-tiedostona tai jopa vain vetää sen. työpöydällesi.

Edistyksellinen näytönkaappaustekniikka käsittelee monimutkaisia sivuja – mukaan lukien sisäiset vieritettävät elementit sekä upotetut iframe-kehykset – toisin kuin mikään muu laajennus.

Miksi Screenshot - koko sivun kuvakaappaus?

✂️ Kuvakaappaus koko sivusta, ei vain näkyvästä alueesta tai valitusta alueesta
💾 Tallenna kuvakaappaukset JPG- ja PNG-muodossa kaappaustyökalumme avulla.
✏️ Rajaa, merkitse. Käytä kuvaeditoria lisätäksesi muotoja, kuten viivoja, ympyröitä, nuolia ja ruutuja.
👀 Upea käyttöliittymä.
⏱️ Ilman rekisteröitymistä. Älä tuhlaa aikaasi tilin luomiseen, vaan ota vain kuvakaappaus.

Älykäs näytönkaappaustyökalu, joka tarjoaa sinulle paljon voimavaroja ja täydellisiä tuloksia tärkeiden verkkosivujen tai asiakirjojen tallentamiseen.

Siinä on kaikki olennaiset ominaisuudet, jotka tekevät siitä hyödyllisen, ja siinä on oltava selainsovellus. Voit helposti kaapata erikokoisia näyttöjä ja tehdä merkintöjä, muokata tehokkaalla sisäänrakennetulla kuvankäsittelyohjelmalla.

Koko sivun kuvakaappauksen saamiseksi sen on vieritettävä jokaiseen näkyvään osioon, joten ole kärsivällinen, sillä se kokoaa nopeasti kaikki osat. Siinä harvinaisessa tilanteessa, jossa sivusi on liian suuri, jotta Chrome ei voi tallentaa yhteen kuvaan, se ilmoittaa sinulle ja jakaa sen kuviksi eri välilehdillä.

Jos tarvitset apua tai haluat ottaa yhteyttä, jos sinulla on kysyttävää tai palautetta, tee se sähköpostitse tai Chrome-kaupan Arvostelut-osiossa!

La meilleure façon de prendre une capture d’écran pleine page de la fenêtre actuelle de votre navigateur. Cliquez sur l'icône Capture d'écran (ou appuyez sur Alt+Maj+P), regardez l'extension capturer chaque partie de la page et soyez transporté vers un nouvel onglet de votre capture d'écran où vous pouvez la télécharger sous forme d'image ou de PDF ou même simplement la faire glisser. sur votre bureau.

La technologie avancée de capture d'écran gère les pages complexes, y compris les éléments de défilement internes ainsi que les iframes intégrés, contrairement à toute autre extension.

Pourquoi une capture d'écran - Capture d'écran pleine page ?

✂️ Capture d'écran de la page entière, pas seulement de la zone visible ou de la zone sélectionnée
💾 Enregistrez les captures d'écran au format JPG et PNG via notre outil de capture.
✏️ Recadrer, annoter. Utilisez l'éditeur d'images pour ajouter des formes telles que des lignes, des cercles, des flèches et des cases.
👀 Excellente interface utilisateur.
⏱️ Sans inscription. Ne perdez pas votre temps à créer un compte, faites simplement une capture d'écran.

Un outil de capture d'écran intelligent qui vous offre de nombreux pouvoirs avec des résultats parfaits pour capturer vos pages Web ou documents importants.

Il possède toutes les fonctionnalités essentielles qui le rendent utile et doit avoir une application de navigateur. Vous pouvez facilement capturer votre écran de différentes tailles et l'annoter, le modifier avec un puissant éditeur d'images intégré.

Afin de capturer la page entière, il faut faire défiler jusqu'à chaque partie visible, alors soyez patient car il assemble rapidement toutes les pièces. Dans le cas rare où votre page est trop volumineuse pour que Chrome puisse la stocker dans une seule image, il vous le fera savoir et la divisera en images dans des onglets séparés.

Si vous avez besoin d'aide ou si vous souhaitez nous contacter pour toute question ou commentaire, faites-le par e-mail ou dans la section Avis de la boutique Chrome !

long.it:
Il modo migliore per acquisire uno screenshot dell'intera pagina della finestra corrente del browser. Fai clic sull'icona Screenshot (o premi Alt+Shift+P), osserva l'estensione catturare ogni parte della pagina e venire trasportato in una nuova scheda dello screenshot dove puoi scaricarlo come immagine o PDF o anche semplicemente trascinarlo sul tuo desktop.

La tecnologia avanzata di acquisizione dello schermo gestisce pagine complesse, inclusi elementi scorrevoli interni e iframe incorporati, a differenza di qualsiasi altra estensione.

Perché Screenshot - Screenshot a pagina intera?

✂️ Screenshot della pagina intera, non solo dell'area visibile o dell'area selezionata
💾 Salva l'acquisizione di screenshot in JPG e PNG tramite il nostro strumento di acquisizione.
✏️ Ritaglia, annota. Utilizza l'editor di immagini per aggiungere forme come linee, cerchi, frecce e riquadri.
👀 Ottima interfaccia utente.
⏱️ Senza registrarsi. Non perdere tempo a creare un account, basta fare uno screenshot.

Uno strumento intelligente per l'acquisizione dello schermo che ti offre molti poteri con risultati perfetti per acquisire pagine Web o documenti importanti.

Ha tutte le funzionalità essenziali che lo rendono utile e deve avere un'applicazione browser. Puoi facilmente catturare il tuo schermo di diverse dimensioni e annotare, modificare con un potente editor di immagini integrato.

Per fare uno screenshot dell'intera pagina è necessario scorrere fino a ciascuna parte visibile, quindi sii paziente poiché assembla rapidamente tutti i pezzi. Per il raro scenario in cui la tua pagina è troppo grande per essere archiviata da Chrome in un'unica immagine, te lo avviserà e la dividerà in immagini in schede separate.

Se hai bisogno di aiuto o desideri contattarci per domande e feedback, fallo tramite email o nella sezione Recensioni del Chrome Store!
long.ko:
현재 브라우저 창의 전체 페이지 스크린샷을 찍는 가장 좋은 방법입니다. 스크린샷 아이콘을 클릭하거나 Alt+Shift+P를 눌러 확장 프로그램이 페이지의 각 부분을 캡처하는 것을 확인하고 스크린샷의 새 탭으로 이동하여 이미지나 PDF로 다운로드하거나 드래그할 수도 있습니다. 데스크탑에.

고급 화면 캡처 기술은 다른 확장 프로그램과 달리 내부 스크롤 가능 요소와 삽입된 iframe을 포함한 복잡한 페이지를 처리합니다.

스크린샷을 사용하는 이유 - 전체 페이지 스크린샷?

✂️ 보이는 영역이나 선택 영역만이 아닌 전체 페이지의 스크린샷
💾 캡처 도구를 통해 캡처한 스크린샷을 JPG 및 PNG로 저장하세요.
✏️ 자르기, 주석 달기. 이미지 편집기를 사용하여 선, 원, 화살표, 상자와 같은 도형을 추가하세요.
🙌 훌륭한 사용자 인터페이스.
⏱️ 회원가입 없이. 계정을 만드는 데 시간을 낭비하지 말고 스크린샷을 찍으세요.

중요한 웹 페이지나 문서를 캡처할 수 있는 완벽한 결과와 함께 많은 기능을 제공하는 스마트 화면 캡처 도구입니다.

그것은 유용하게 만드는 모든 필수 기능을 갖추고 있으며 브라우저 응용 프로그램이 있어야 합니다. 다양한 크기의 화면을 쉽게 캡처하고 주석을 달고 강력한 내장 이미지 편집기로 편집할 수 있습니다.

전체 페이지를 스크린샷하려면 보이는 각 부분으로 스크롤해야 하므로 모든 부분을 빠르게 조립하므로 인내심을 가지시기 바랍니다. 페이지가 너무 커서 Chrome이 하나의 이미지에 저장할 수 없는 드문 경우에는 페이지를 알려주고 별도의 탭에 있는 이미지로 분할합니다.

도움이 필요하거나 질문이나 피드백이 필요한 경우 이메일을 보내거나 Chrome 스토어의 리뷰 섹션을 통해 문의하세요!

Den avanserte skjermfangstteknologien håndterer komplekse sider – inkludert indre rullbare elementer så vel som innebygde iframes – i motsetning til alle andre utvidelser.

Hvorfor skjermbilde – skjermbilde på hele siden?

✂️ Skjermbilde av hele siden, ikke bare det synlige området eller det valgte området
💾 Lagre skjermbilder tatt i JPG og PNG gjennom fangstverktøyet vårt.
✏️ Beskjær, kommenter. Bruk bilderedigering for å legge til former som linjer, sirkler, piler og bokser.
👀 Flott brukergrensesnitt.
⏱️ Uten registrering. Ikke kast bort tiden din på å opprette en konto, bare ta et skjermbilde.

Et smart skjermfangstverktøy som gir deg mange krefter med perfekte resultater for å fange dine viktige nettsider eller dokumenter.

Den har alle viktige funksjoner som gjør den nyttig og må ha nettleserapplikasjon. Du kan enkelt ta opp skjermen i forskjellige størrelser og kommentere, redigere med en kraftig innebygd bilderedigerer.

For å ta et skjermbilde av hele siden må den rulle til hver synlig del, så vær tålmodig da den raskt monterer alle delene. For det sjeldne scenariet der siden din er for stor til at Chrome kan lagres i ett bilde, vil den gi deg beskjed og dele den opp i bilder i separate faner.

Najlepszy sposób na zrobienie zrzutu ekranu całej strony bieżącego okna przeglądarki. Kliknij ikonę zrzutu ekranu (lub naciśnij Alt+Shift+P), zobacz, jak rozszerzenie przechwytuje każdą część strony i zostanie przeniesione do nowej karty zrzutu ekranu, skąd możesz pobrać go jako obraz lub plik PDF, a nawet po prostu przeciągnąć na swój pulpit.

Zaawansowana technologia przechwytywania ekranu obsługuje złożone strony — w tym wewnętrzne elementy przewijane, a także osadzone ramki iframe — w przeciwieństwie do innych rozszerzeń.

Dlaczego zrzut ekranu — zrzut ekranu całej strony?

✂️ Zrzut ekranu całej strony, a nie tylko widocznego lub wybranego obszaru
💾 Zapisz przechwycone zrzuty ekranu w formacie JPG i PNG za pomocą naszego narzędzia do przechwytywania.
✏️ Przycinaj, dodawaj adnotacje. Użyj edytora obrazów, aby dodać kształty, takie jak linie, okręgi, strzałki i prostokąty.
👀 Świetny interfejs użytkownika.
⏱️Bez rejestracji. Nie marnuj czasu na tworzenie konta, po prostu zrób zrzut ekranu.

Inteligentne narzędzie do przechwytywania ekranu, które zapewnia wiele możliwości i doskonałe rezultaty w przechwytywaniu ważnych stron internetowych lub dokumentów.

Posiada wszystkie istotne funkcje, które czynią go użytecznym i musi mieć aplikację przeglądarkową. Możesz łatwo przechwycić ekran o różnych rozmiarach i dodawać adnotacje oraz edytować za pomocą potężnego wbudowanego edytora obrazów.

Aby zrobić zrzut ekranu całej strony, należy przewinąć do każdej widocznej części, więc prosimy o cierpliwość, ponieważ szybko składa wszystkie elementy. W rzadkich przypadkach, gdy Twoja strona jest zbyt duża, aby Chrome mogła ją zapisać na jednym obrazie, poinformuje Cię o tym i podzieli ją na obrazy w oddzielnych kartach.

Jeśli potrzebujesz pomocy lub chcesz skontaktować się z pytaniami i opiniami, zrób to e-mailem lub w sekcji Recenzje w sklepie Chrome!

You can make a screenshot of any website absolutely for free using our app.

What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. In fact, some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re really seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster.

About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots Can Help You Get More Work Done

1. Collaborate with Others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate How to Perform a Function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day.

For example, explain to a new employee how to login. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show Exactly What’s Happening

If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
 
A screenshot of an error message helps avoid confusion by showing someone exactly what you’re seeing

The best part about screenshot? They’re easy! As Buffer notes, screenshots are powerful yet simple to use. In fact, it only takes a second to make a screenshot. So start using screenshots today, and download.

Alternatively referred to as a print screen, screen dump, snapshot, or screen capture, a screen shot or screenshot is an image of what's currently displayed on a screen. Screenshots can be created by a software program or operating system. Once a screenshot is captured, it can be saved as an image file (e.g., GIF or JPEG). You can also manipulate and print the image after it is saved. The picture is an example screenshot from the game.

What Is a Screenshot?

When used as a verb, screenshot means capturing a static image of a device's display. In other words, it takes a picture of whatever shows on the computer, mobile, or tablet screen at the time.

Klicka på skärmbildsikonen (eller tryck på Alt+Skift+P), se tillägget fånga varje del av sidan och transporteras till en ny flik på din skärmdump där du kan ladda ner den som en bild eller PDF eller till och med bara dra den till ditt skrivbord.

Den avancerade skärmbildstekniken hanterar komplexa sidor – inklusive inre rullningsbara element samt inbäddade iframes – till skillnad från alla andra tillägg.

Varför skärmdump - helsida skärmdump?

✂️ Skärmdump av hela sidan, inte bara det synliga området eller det valda området
💾 Spara skärmdumpar som tagits i JPG och PNG genom vårt fångstverktyg.
✏️ Beskär, kommentera. Använd bildredigeraren för att lägga till former som linjer, cirklar, pilar och rutor.

För att skärmdumpa hela sidan måste den rulla till varje synlig del, så ha tålamod eftersom det snabbt sätter ihop alla bitar. För det sällsynta scenariot där din sida är för stor för att Chrome ska kunna lagra i en bild, kommer den att meddela dig och dela upp den i bilder på separata flikar.

Mevcut tarayıcı pencerenizin tam sayfa ekran görüntüsünü almanın en iyi yolu. Ekran görüntüsü simgesine tıklayın (veya Alt+Shift+P tuşlarına basın), uzantının sayfanın her bölümünü yakalamasını izleyin ve ekran görüntünüzde, onu bir resim veya PDF olarak indirebileceğiniz veya hatta yalnızca sürükleyebileceğiniz yeni bir sekmeye aktarın. masaüstünüze.

Gelişmiş ekran yakalama teknolojisi, diğer uzantılardan farklı olarak, dahili kaydırılabilir öğelerin yanı sıra gömülü iframe'ler de dahil olmak üzere karmaşık sayfaları yönetir.

Neden Ekran Görüntüsü – Tam Sayfa Ekran Görüntüsü?

✂️ Yalnızca görünür alanın veya seçilen alanın değil, tam sayfanın ekran görüntüsü
💾 Yakalama aracımız aracılığıyla yakaladığınız ekran görüntülerini JPG ve PNG formatında kaydedin.
✏️ Kırpın, açıklama ekleyin. Çizgiler, daireler, oklar ve kutular gibi şekiller eklemek için resim düzenleyiciyi kullanın.
👀 Mükemmel Kullanıcı Arayüzü.
⏱️Kayıt olmadan. Hesap oluşturmakla zaman kaybetmeyin, sadece Ekran Görüntüsü alın.

Önemli web sayfalarınızı veya belgelerinizi yakalamak için size mükemmel sonuçlarla birçok güç sağlayan akıllı ekran yakalama aracı.

Onu kullanışlı kılan tüm temel özelliklere sahiptir ve tarayıcı uygulamasına sahip olması gerekir. Güçlü bir yerleşik görüntü düzenleyiciyle ekranınızı farklı boyutlarda kolayca yakalayabilir ve açıklamalar ekleyebilir, düzenleyebilirsiniz.

Tüm sayfanın ekran görüntüsünü alabilmek için, sayfanın görünen her bölüme kaydırılması gerekir, bu nedenle tüm parçaları hızlı bir şekilde birleştirdiğinden lütfen sabırlı olun. Sayfanızın Chrome'un tek bir resimde depolayamayacağı kadar büyük olduğu nadir durumlarda, sayfanızı ayrı sekmelerdeki resimlere bölerek bunu size bildirecektir.

Yardıma ihtiyacınız varsa veya soru ve geri bildirimleriniz için bize ulaşmak istiyorsanız bunu e-postayla veya Chrome mağazasının İncelemeler bölümünden yapın!
